titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of March 23, 2023, as "Pakistan Day".
Expressing support for the designation of March 23, 2023, as "Pakistan Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of Pakistan Day to celebrate the role played by the Pakistani-American community in strengthening and inspiring the people of the United States.
